word:
(431)     B.-260-'07.         August 29, 1907. 

Dear Brother and Sister Burden:- 
     I have been very anxious to learn something of the meetings you have been holding; W. C. White had written us no particulars. I should be glad if you would bear in mind that I am intensely interested in this meeting, and desire to know about it. Has it meant victory or defeat?
